result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.html: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ ár ndornálaiṫe go dian cé naċ raiḃ traenálaí ar biṫ leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: We were not fast enough, though.
result.ga: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfach
result.orig: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfach
result.html: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfachWe were not fast enough, though.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ muid tapa go leor áfaċWe were not fast enough, though.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé an ríoṁṗost tar éis gur ċláraiġ méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.eng: I fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ga: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil
result.orig: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil
result.html: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúilI fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit mé i mo ċodlaḋ cé go raiḃ an scannán an-suimiúilI fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: Má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: At the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ga: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.orig: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.html: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ponchtml: I ndeireaḋ an lae áṁ ní féidir na líoṁaintí seo a ċruṫúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
